channel.title: Bot
channel.description: Does any one know the best tut for learning to make ur own bots or just modifing bots??

item.title: Bot
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="_s, post:12, topic:382193"][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=477994.msg3499514#msg3499514 date=1297624575]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=477994.msg3499390#msg3499390 date=1297618145]

[quote author=_s link=topic=477994.msg3499191#msg3499191 date=1297604606]

rsbot uses asm you dumb faggots
[/quote]Oh, so all bots use ASM? No, the point was he wants to make a bot, not ‘recreate’ RSBot in particular.
[/quote]i never said anything about all bots, i said rsbot in particular. you implied it used reflection, it doesn’t.[/quote]
Actually, I was implying he should research reflection before trying to make a bot that will automatically update and the like. I didn’t mean reflection was the only thing he should research. And I doubt if he researched only asm he would be able to do it either

Why? Im pretty sure you can write a bot with just ASM…

yeah, Davidi is being dumb. idfk why you’d ever need to know reflection to make a bot using ASM or BCEL.[/quote]Hmm let me try to get this into you again: I’m not talking about RSBot. I said he could reflection, which would work as well. I personally have never even touched ASM.

EDIT - Wow what a pointless argument. OP can decide what to use out of the options given.

Read full topic

Actually, I was implying he should research reflection before trying to make a bot that will automatically update and the like. I didn’t mean reflection was the only thing he should research. And I doubt if he researched only asm he would be able to do it either

Why? Im pretty sure you can write a bot with just ASM…[/quote]
yeah, Davidi is being dumb. idfk why you’d ever need to know reflection to make a bot using ASM or BCEL.

Your replies are useless. It doesn’t even matter what bytecode engineering library rsbot uses, the discussion was about creating something like rsbot.[/quote]

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:382193”][quote author=_s link=topic=477994.msg3498283#msg3498283 date=1297522788]

I’m pretty sure it doesn’t…[/quote]
yes it does, it originally used bcel however they switched to asm
